Title: Your Best Year Ever, Chapter 3: You Can Upgrade Your Beliefs
Description:
In this chapter of Your Best Year Ever, Michael talks about your ability to change your limiting beliefs into powerful liberating truths which can lead you to incredible personal growth.

Reminder that this is the third chapter in Michael Hyatt's revised and updated best-selling book, Your Best Year Ever. Over the next month, we'll be releasing a few chapters a week so that you can be prepared for 2024 to be your Best Year Ever.

If you want to read or listen to the entire book today, then visit www.yourbestyeareverbook.com and pick up a copy. After buying the book, make sure to sign up for your FREE ticket to Your Best Year Ever Live (a $197 value!).

www.yourbestyeareverbook.com.
